title: The Thin Man and The Fat Man
description: This week's Case Closed begins with The Adventure Of The Haunted Hams, from The Thin Man. This episode originally aired July 13, 1948. (30:15) The Fat Man brings us our second story this week. We hear Murder Plays Hide And Seek, his broadcast from January 2, 1948. https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr12022/CaseClosed798.mp3  Download CaseClosed798 Support Case Closed!
content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed begins with The Adventure Of The Haunted Hams, from The Thin Man. This episode originally aired July 13, 1948.

(30:15) The Fat Man brings us our second story this week. We hear Murder Plays Hide And Seek, his broadcast from January 2, 1948.
